title: Connect club - a part of the Metaverse for human connections & community builders
description: Connect with like-minded people, start a club & build a strong community in a designed virtual space
h1: A part of the Metaverse for human connections & community builders
main_description: Connect with like-minded people, start a club & build a strong community in a designed virtual space

header.title: Join United Metaverse Club & contribute to the community

item1.content: It was a pleasure for me. The app is interesting.

item1.name: Choose a virtual room
item1.description: Participate in events or create your own, invite your friends and meet new people.

item3.name: Connect with doers
item3.description: Create your profile and find people with the same interests in your field.

item1.name: Choose interests to find a relevant club
item1.description: Choose any of interests and gather like-minded people in the club

item2.name: Participate club events
item2.description: Create events and meet people with common interests there

item3.name: Invite people
item3.description: Create a great community and discuss topics that match your interests

item1.name: Create a virtual art gallery
item1.description: A virtual room with places to put digital art and make a real exhibition

item2.name: Arrange an interactive tour
item2.description: Create a tour for people and show them your art collection

item3.name: Sell and buy digital art
item3.description: Right inside you can find out the details and make a deal

section3.title: Who are the people
section3.description: World-renowned experts, educators, scientists, business leaders, startup founders, artists, and social groups. We connect people who thrive on inspiration, learning, growing in their careers, and culture.

slider2.title: Join our Clubs or Make Your Own

item1.name: Dome Sandbox
item1.description: Experts and leaders openly work with the startups to help them raise the first round of investments.

item2.name: ELK Club
item2.description: A global community of educators and English teachers who are building new formats of digital education.

item3.name: Meta Education
item3.description: A collaboration of global EDTech projects to created Education 5.0 inside the Metaverse.

section4.title: About Connect.Club
section4.description: Connect.Club is a part of the future Metaverse, created for like-minded individuals to start a club, develop & build a strong community, and to find meaningful & human connections in a designed virtual space.

section5.title: Building DAO
section5.description: Decentralized governance is crucial to building and managing a globally dispersed community—and therefore has a decisive role for the success of the Connect.Club ecosystem.
